title: Mobile-Based Playful English: Short-Intensive Microlearning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Integration of gamification elements accessible solely via smartphones, reflecting real-world work scenarios for job seekers

learning_goals: Use over 30 job-related English expressions contextually through mobile quiz games.
Achieve over 80% accuracy in business English conversations using an interactive role-play app.
Improve pronunciation accuracy by 40% using AI voice feedback.
Store 150+ new vocabulary items in long-term memory within a week using a digital flashcard system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
